author: Ove
content: I can imagine that lens feels good from time to time. I had a super-zoom compact a while ago, with a lens capable of 35-420mm in 35mm speak. That was convenient, for sure. It was important to work with the right aperture, though, because sometimes the lens really did not deliver others than sharpened blur. The 420mm was however extremely useful sometimes, never mind the quality. ðŸ™‚
